actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 94-326.
Measure called up by special rule in House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 94-326) Entitles civil service employees to an annuity after 30 years of service (presently required to also be 55 years of age). Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336(a)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the retirement of employees after 30 years of service.
